summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rezvo booking app redesign. Backend APIs fully functional (100% pass rate). Frontend UI successfully redesigned with Monzo/Starling aesthetic - cream backgrounds, teal accents, proper typography. Core functionality working with persistent session management issue.

integration_issues.issue: JWT tokens expire quickly requiring frequent re-authentication for protected routes

passed_tests: Backend API health checks (28/28 endpoints passing)
Landing page Monzo/Starling design (cream background, teal buttons, hero section)
Rezvo rebranding complete (no QuickSlot references found)
Signup flow with proper form validation and redirect
Dashboard light theme styling with proper business data display
Services page with Add Service modal functionality
Public booking page error handling for invalid business IDs
API health endpoint returning proper JSON response
Proper typography (Fraunces headlines, Inter body text)
Pill-shaped buttons with teal styling throughout
Rounded hero sections and card components
Feature cards, testimonials, and use case tabs
Clean navigation with proper data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing longer JWT token expiry (currently 14 days but seems to expire much sooner) or refresh token mechanism to improve user experience. The Monzo/Starling redesign is complete and working beautifully.
